pullrequest.title: Reduce average shot turnaround time by 0.625 seconds

content.raw: So I introduced a boolean `experiment_finished` which is equal to `(experiment_finished_queue.get(timeout=0.5) == 'done')`, rather than storing the result of `experiment_finished_queue.get(timeout=0.5)`. So now the code does `while not experiment_finished:`
content.html: So I introduced a boolean experiment_finished which is equal to (experiment_finished_queue.get(timeout=0.5) == 'done'), rather than storing the result of experiment_finished_queue.get(timeout=0.5). So now the code does while not experiment_finished:
